alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 26 at 9:24PM PDT until October 30 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph. Gusts up 60 mph possible in the foothills of the Santa Ana Mountains. * WHERE...Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northeast winds will coincide with low relative humidity values near 5 to 10 percent. This will create elevated to locally critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
